synopsis.text: High school student Ookami has an encounter with a notorious "skirt thief" who tries to steal her skirt. Fortunately, her teacher Akagashira happens to be passing by and intervenes, rescuing Ookami. As thanks, she invites Akagashira back to her home. However, Ookami has ulterior motives - she has long harbored feelings for Akagashira and views this as an opportunity to act on her desire. Once alone together inside with the lights out, Ookami makes advances on the reluctant Akagashira. As her teacher, he knows he should resist but finds himself overwhelmed. Will he give in to temptation or maintain his role as her teacher? Their intimate encounter unfolds with uncensored explicit scenes.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
